*TS*Episode 5 - No way I regretted it
Are you here to see Kamijou-kun?
Huh?
Yeah.
Oh, I am sorry.
We have arranged a new treatment for him.
He is in the rehabilitation room right now.
Oh, I see.
Thank you.
She always comes by to pay him a visit.
That patient is a real handful.
We are lucky to have her.
I hope she can do something for him.
Before the accident, he was a child prodigy with the violin.
Even if he is able to walk again, his fingers will prevent him from being able to play music.
Why did it have to be Kyosuke?
No matter how well my fingers work, they will never do me any good.
Why did this have to happen to him instead of me?
If he is able to recover thanks to my wish, how would that make him feel?
Would it be a mere, thank you?
Is there something more that I want him to say?
I am...
Looking back now, I did not understand anything.
I did not understand a thing about miracles.
Nor did I understand the price I would have to pay.
Episode 4 There Exists Both Miracles and Magic
Episode 4 There Exists Both Miracles and Magic
You have got something there.
Madoka.
If you do not start eating, you will be late.
Yeah...
Nee-chan, what is wrong?
Is the food that bad?
No, it is really good.
It is really delicious.
Papa's cooking is so delicious because I am alive.
No matter what I said after that, there was no response.
I even worked up some tears and asked if I had said something weird again.
It was really hard not to burst out laughing.
Sayaka-chan, about what happened yesterday...
I am sorry, not right now.
We can talk about it later.
I am weird, am I not?
I would not say that.
Speaking of nitrates and hot springs, we must refer back to our medical science for the answer.
However, based on what we have seen, the estimated number of people living in poverty is largely inaccurate.
Thus, females above the age of 30 may still have a chance to fall in love and get married.
And so, the correct form to use here is the present tense rather than the past.
It is almost like we somehow ended up in an unfamiliar land.
The school where we met Hitomi-chan is exactly the same as yesterday.
But everywhere you look, there are strangers.
Everyone is a stranger.
We know about Magical Girls and Mami-san.
But everyone else is oblivious.
We are living in a different world, and the things we see are completely different.
Sayaka-chan.
Everything changed a long time ago.
We should have realized it sooner.
Madoka, do you still intend to become a Magical Girl?
I guess that is how it is.
There is nothing we can do.
We knew this was not going to be easy.
We cannot just back out now.
But when I think about the way she died, I feel like I am suffocating.
I am scared.
I do not want this.
Mami-san was a very kind and gentle person.
How disillusioned must one be to do battle?
In order to show us that...
Kyubei, where will this road lead us?
Who will take Mami-san's place and protect everyone from the Witches?
This has always been Mami's territory,
but now that there is nobody guarding it, the other Magical Girls will not just sit back and watch.
There will soon be others coming to deal with the Witches here.
Will they be in it just for the grief seeds?
Like that transfer student.
It is true that people like Mami are rare.
Most would first weigh the pros and cons before acting.
Everyone wants something.
So...
But only those who also carry the burden of being a Magical Girl have the right to criticize them.
I understand what you are thinking.
Although it is unfortunate, I cannot force you.
Let us end things here.
I need to search for more people who will form a contract with me.
I am sorry, Kyubei.
I should be the one apologizing.
I should not have gotten you mixed up in this.
It is been a short journey, but I still want to thank you.
It was fun living with you, Madoka.
I am sorry.
I am sorry that I am so useless.
I am so sorry.
Homura-chan.
Kaname Madoka, you are blaming yourself too much for what happened.
There is no one who can criticize you.
If someone were to, I would not let them go easily.
Will you listen to what I have to say?
Sure.
If only I had listened to you earlier...
You still would not have been able to affect the fate of Tomoe Mami.
But your fate has changed.
Even if I can only save one person, that is enough to make me truly happy.
Homura-chan seems to have experienced happiness, but it is kind of different from Mami-san's type.
That is very likely.
I will not deny it.
You have already seen lots of people die like that, right?
Just like that scene from yesterday.
Yes.
How many?
Too many to bother counting.
Will that room remain as it is forever?
Tomoe Mami has no relatives.
I imagine it will be a while before anyone reports her missing.
No one will know that Mami-san is dead?
There is nothing we can do.
You will not leave behind a corpse if you die in that world.
In this world, she is merely a lost soul.
That is the fate of all Magical Girls.
That is so cruel.
She was always fighting alone to protect everyone.
But to think that nobody will ever know...
It is too lonely.
We all have made the contract and received this power.
It is not meant for anyone else.
All we can do is stand for what we believe in and continue to fight.
Even if nobody recognizes us, and nobody remembers who we are.
There is absolutely nothing that we can do.
But I remember her.
I will never forget Mami-san.
Never.
Is that so?
I am sure that would make her very happy.
I am jealous.
Homura-chan too!
I definitely will not forget you!
I will never forget how you saved us yesterday!
Homura-chan.
You are too kind.
You must remember that this kindness may lead you into even greater pain.
What are you listening to?
Lieder und Gesange.
Oh, Debussy?
It is a beautiful piece, is not it?
Most people do not expect me to be interested in classical music.
So when I tell them that I know the name of a piece, they are always really surprised.
It is kind of unexpected, and they respect me for it.
Kyousuke, if you had not shown these to me, I probably never would have heard them.
Sayaka, do you...
What is it?
Do you hate me?
Why are you still making me listen to music?
Are you trying to hurt me?
But you like music.
I do not want to listen to this!
Just listening to music when I cannot even play...
I cannot move them...
I cannot feel pain at all...
These hands are...
You will be all right.
I am sure they will get better.
Do not lose hope.
They will heal someday.
I was told to give up.
The doctor came in-person and told me to give up on music.
He said it is not possible with the current technology.
My hands will never move again.
Unless miracles or magic exist, they will not get better.
They do.
Miracles and magic do exist.
I could have made friends with Homura-chan if I had talked to her.
Why was she fighting with Mami-san?
Huh?
Hitomi-chan?
Hitomi-chan!
About today's homework!
Huh?
It is just like the woman from that time.
Hitomi-chan!
Hey, Hitomi-chan!
Oh my, Kaname-san.
Hello.
Wh-What is wrong?
Where are you going?
Where am I going...
I am going to a place that is much better than this.
Hitomi-chan...
Oh, I know!
Why do not you come with me, Kaname-san?
Yes.
That would be splendid.
What should I do?
Could this be...
If I could just contact Homura-chan...
I do not know her phone number!
That is right...
I am useless.
I cannot even run a small factory correctly.
The way I am now...
I have no place to go to.
Super Vodka
Danger!
Do not mix!
Super Vodka
Danger!
Do not mix!
Super Vodka
Danger!
Do not mix!
Super Vodka
Danger!
Do not mix!
Super Vodka
Danger!
Do not mix!
Listen up, Madoka.
If you mix these together, something bad will happen.
It could kill everyone here.
So you must not mix them.
No...
You cannot do that!
It would be imprudent to interfere.
This is a ritual of offering.
But it is dangerous!
Everyone here will die!
That is right.
Everyone here will soon embark on a journey through wonderland.
Cannot you understand how wonderful that would be?
A living body is nothing more than a hindrance.
Kaname-san, you will come to understand soon enough.
Let go of me!
What should I do?!
What should I do?!
No...
This is...
No...
Save me!
Someone!
Is this my punishment?
Because I am weak?
Because I am a liar?
I have to pay the price.
Sayaka-chan?!
This should finish you!
Sorry about that.
Looks like I made it just in the nick of time.
Sayaka-chan, that costume...
I guess you could say I changed my mind.
It is fine!
I did well for my first time, do not you think?
But...
You...
You are late, Transfer Student!
I did not think you would actually come.
I heard about that Mami going and getting herself killed, so I made the trip out here.
What is going on here?
This is completely different from what you said!
I am sorry about that.
The city has a new Magical Girl now.
I only just formed the contract with her.
What is with you?
I am pretty pissed.
Like I would just give up on such a suitable breeding ground.
What do you intend to do?
Do you even need to ask?
I just need to beat her.
That girl...
Kobayashi Jin
I have started my flight.
Now, I, Magical Girl Sayaka, will do my utmost best to allow the peace of Mitakihara City to prevail.
Episode 5 No Way I would Regret It.
No Way I would Regret It.
